data.eml:eml: Review of the planthopper genus Neodurium Fennah, 1956 (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Issidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chang, Zhi-Min, Chen, Xiang-Sheng, Webb, Mick (2015): Review of the planthopper genus Neodurium Fennah, 1956 (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Issidae). ZooKeys 517: 83-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.517.8817, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.517.8817
